name: The Sewer Job
description:
The Sewer Job Is a first-person horror game that takes place in a city and its sewer



Story
After getting expelled on the last year of highschool everything went downhill for you, parents didn't consider you to be their child anymore and all your friends left you. The day you have been dreading finally came around, you turned 18, as expected you instantly got kicked out by your parents and with nowhere left to go or any money to use you thought your life was over. But that's when you saw an advertisement about a work in the sewers which also included free housing, you thought to yourself that this was to good to be true and a failure like me could never be accepted. Miracle struck and you somehow got accepted, a new chance at life.

Key Features
  • Immersive graphics
  • Creepy atmosphere
  • Varying simple tasks to do
  • Talk with NPCs
  • Multiple endings [4 Endings]

Disclaimer: This game contains jumpscares
